annotations.description: On this episode of Chaser, I am taking another look at the Vesper Martini that I tried out in my last “How to Drink” episode. In the first episode, I used St...
annotations.title: Vesper Martini | Chaser

textContent:
1.5oz Ford's Gin
.5oz Vodka
.25oz Kina L'aero D'or or Cocchi Americano

Shaken and pour
Garnish with lemon twist
